name: JetBrains AI Assistant
description:
JetBrains AI Assistant seamlessly integrates with your IDE to help you code faster, smarter, and with less effort.


AI Assistant offers intelligent code completion, explains and generates code, writes documentation, suggests commit messages, and answers questions through an AI-powered, context-aware chat.


You can choose from top-tier cloud-based LLMs or connect your own local models, giving you the flexibility and control to work your way.



AI Assistant is part of the JetBrains AI subscription and includes a free tier available in all JetBrains IDEs.

Learn more about the pricing plans


What’s included:

  • Unlimited code completion powered by Mellum, JetBrains’ proprietary AI model.
  • Context-aware AI chat that understands your code and helps you in real time.
  • Access to top-tier models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google.
  • Offline mode with connected local LLMs via Ollama or LM Studio.
  • Deep integration into IDE workflows, including code suggestions in the editor, VCS assistance, runtime error explanation, and more.

Learn more about the features


Code security and privacy

  • Not used for training: Your code and data are never used to train AI models.
  • Zero data retention: Data processed through JetBrains AI is not persisted by JetBrains or any third-party providers.
  • Full control and flexibility: Exclude specific files or projects from the AI context or switch to offline mode – you decide how and when AI is used.

We value your feedback

You can upvote existing issues in our YouTrack or log in and create a new one. Or just contact support for further assistance.



Unlock your full coding potential with AI Assistant — making your workflow smarter, faster, and more enjoyable every step of the way.

Getting started

To enable AI Assistant, open a project in your go-to JetBrains IDE, click the AI icon on the right-hand toolbar, and follow the instructions that appear.
